sense.def:
To spill a liquid
pomeni po nesreči povzročiti, da tekočina steče iz posode, v kateri je.

seg.quote: She carried the bucket without spilling a drop.
Make sure the water doesn't spill over the floor.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje ali stvari
spill out of a place
, prihajajo od nekod v velikem številu.

seg.quote: Crowds started spilling out of bars.
